title: Mouse Moments - A Humorous Guide Through The Magic Kingdom
description: Updated for 2012 with Storybook Circus! Do you love the Magic Kingdom? Taking your first trip to Florida and have no idea what to do? Love The Mouse but don't take yourself too seriously? Well then, this is your book! I'll give you my straight talking reviews with a dose of my irreverent adult sense of humor. I'll share with you reviews of rides, attractions and dining, as well as tips, tricks and little known facts about Walt's new Disneyland "writ large".
author: Deirdre A Sargent
